name: zowifier
description: Little web service to generate Zowis using any STL model
author: Jes√∫s Arroyo <jesus.arroyo@bq.com>

scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -d blender ]; then wget http://mirror.cs.umn.edu/blender.org/release/Blender2.78/blender-2.78-linux-glibc211-x86_64.tar.bz2; tar -jxvf blender-2.78-linux-glibc211-x86_64.tar.bz2; mv blender-2.78-linux-glibc211-x86_64 blender; fi; rm -f blender-2.78-linux-glibc211-x86_64.tar.bz2*
